inclusion.criterion: Referred for aortic valve intervention (surgical AVR / TAVI)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: High clinical suspicion of amyloid (e.g. low-flow low-gradient AS, inappropriate LVH)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to MRI scanning (e.g. permanent pacemaker)

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis and is referred for aortic valve intervention, but high clinical suspicion of amyloid is unknown.
